## Urban Institute R Graphics Guide

`urban_theme.R` and this version of the R Graphics Guide have been deprecated. Please install [library(urbnthemes)](https://github.com/UI-Research/urbnthemes) and visit the [Urban Institute R Users Group website](https://ui-research.github.io/r-at-urban/graphics-guide.html).
